description:
Chopper and Usopp flip over Franky`s new body, Brook must choose between rock-n-roll stardom and the life of a pirate, and Luffy wanders into a very dangerous crowd!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Big Guns Assembled! The Danger of the Fake Straw Hats!
Oomono Shuuketsu: Nise Mugiwara Ichimi no Kyoui
Rassemblement général ! La menace des faux Chapeaux de Paille !
Массированное наступление! Фальшивые Мугивары в опасности!
大物集結 ニセ麦わら一味の脅威
